thread.title: Top 20 Global Concert Tours from Pollstar
thread.title_full: Top 20 Global Concert Tours from Pollstar

title: Top 20 Global Concert Tours from Pollstar
text:
The Canadian Press - ONLINE EDITION Top 20 Global Concert Tours from Pollstar By: The Associated Press Report Error 
The Top 20 Global Concert Tours ranks artists by average box office gross per city and includes the average ticket price for shows worldwide. The list is based on data provided to the trade publication Pollstar by concert promoters and venue managers. 
TOP 20 GLOBAL CONCERT TOURS 
1. Taylor Swift; $4,982,713; $112.56. 
2. Kenny Chesney; $2,890,998; $91.02. 
3. Ed Sheeran; $1,689,262; $66.49. 
4. Luke Bryan; $1,678,218; $54.16. 
5. Violetta; $1,328,823; $63.28. 
6. Foo Fighters; $1,319,671; $59.66. 
7. Rush; $1,223,574; $90.11. 
8. Dave Matthews Band; $1,195,762; $57.44. 
9. Mana; $1,170,856; $105.17. 
11. Shania Twain; $1,107,122; $95.99. 
12. Nicki Minaj; $653,854; $45.00. 
13. Motley Crue; $651,728; $72.08. 
14. Sunrise Avenue; $648,214; $46.64. 
15. Florida Georgia Line; $604,103; $35.10. 
16. Chris Brown; $594,202; $43.07. 
17. Marco Antonio Solis; $576,896; $105.46. 
18. Chayanne; $569,559; $88.34. 
19. Def Leppard; $568,604; $45.10. 
20. J. Cole; $567,289; $34.63. Rate this This article has not yet been rated. We want you to tell us what you think of our articles.
